help.overview: This plugin allows admins to control the bot.
help.command: Causes the bot to quit irc.
Causes the bot to join a channel.
Causes the bot to part a channel.
Causes the bot to cycle (part and rejoin) a channel.
Causes the bot to say something to the specified channel.
Causes the bot to send a message to the specified nickname.
help.usage: msg nickname some text to send
help.command: Causes the bot to op you in a given channel if you are both a user and a valid op for that channel.
